sparse feature pairs.from sentence: Here we apply sparse feature pairs to hypernym extraction .

hypernymy.from sentence:
Sparse representation is related to hypernymy in various natural ways .
One of them is through Formal concept Analysis ( FCA ) .

trees.from sentence: Another natural formulation is related to hierarchical sparse coding , where trees describe the order in which variables " enter the model " ( i.e. , take non - zero values ) .

correspondence.from sentence: Exploiting the correspondence between the variable tree and the hypernym hierarchy offers itself as a natural choice .
